amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment SA 5633 pursuant to the order of September 18, 2008, having achieved the required 60 votes in the affirmative, is agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 2. Record Vote Number: 202.
Amendment SA 5633 proposed by Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S9234-9238, S9238-9254) In the nature of a substitute.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5633 proposed by Senator Baucus.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 5633 pursuant to the order of September 18, 2008, having achieved the required 60 votes in the affirmative, is agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 2. Record Vote Number: 202.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5633 pursuant to the order of September 18, 2008, having achieved the required 60 votes in the affirmative, is agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 2. Record Vote Number: 202.
